subject: Sentences (Criminal)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The drunken driver responsible for a 2009 crash that killed her close friend and seriously injured the soccer star Charlie Davies was sentenced Friday to two years in prison.
snippet: The drunken driver responsible for a 2009 crash that killed her close friend and seriously injured the soccer star Charlie Davies was sentenced Friday to two years in prison.
